remarks.format: ## Remarks 字体系列是一组字体，它们具有相同的字样，如 Arial，但功能不同。A font family is a set of fonts that have the same typeface, such as Arial, but that differ in features. 这些功能差异包括 （如斜体）和 ，如粗体。These feature differences include , such as italic, and , such as bold. ![字体](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "字体")![Fonts](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Fonts") "New Roman" 字体系列成员的字样示例Example of typefaces that are "Times New Roman" font family members

summary.span: 从指定字体位置返回 对象的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of objects from a specified font location.
